senses.sense_definition: A flat-topped hill or small plateau with steep sides, usually found in dry regions.

examples.text: We climbed to the top of the <w>mesa</w> to watch the sunset over the desert.
The landscape was filled with red rocks and a large, flat <w>mesa</w> in the distance.

senses.sense_definition: A raised section on a semiconductor wafer used to isolate components from one another.

examples.text: The engineer examined the <w>mesa</w> structure under a powerful microscope.
Etching was used to create a distinct <w>mesa</w> on the silicon chip.

senses.sense_definition: A city in the state of Arizona, United States.

examples.text: My friend moved to <w>Mesa</w> because she loves the warm weather.
We drove through <w>Mesa</w> on our way to Phoenix.

senses.sense_definition: The Mining Enforcement and Safety Administration, a former US government agency.

examples.text: The safety regulations were originally established by <w>MESA</w> in the 1970s.
He worked as an inspector for <w>MESA</w> before the department was reorganized.
